de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.unlabeled.epinions

Class ExtractSentencesFromXML.EpinionsReviewHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.unlabeled.epinions.ExtractSentencesFromXML.EpinionsReviewHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    Enclosing class:
    ExtractSentencesFromXML

    public static class ExtractSentencesFromXML.EpinionsReviewHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    Read the XML files in format (Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay 2009) 20 "Entry Level" 2006/8/25 Battery Life5.0 Portability4.0 Clarity5.0 Durability4.0 Product Rating5.0 carl zeiss lens minolta would have attracted more photographers Using the Sony name will probably give it an "entry level" status. It's a great toy for people who will buy their first DSLR. But dont expect the camera to attract Canon or Nikon enthusiasts. The file must be in UTF-8. Split into sentences. Extract all sentences with ID formed by review-id + running sentence number
    Author:
    kesslewd
